line.annotation: create_ing(ing40, "1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained")
create_ing(ing42, "1/2 cup drained marinated artichoke hearts")

line.originaltext: Quaker® Quakes® Ranch or Sour Cream and Onion Flavor Rice Snacks
line.annotation: create_ing(ing46, "Quaker Ranch or Sour Cream and Onion Flavor Rice Snacks")

line.originaltext: Combine all ingredients except parsley and Quaker® Rice Snacks in work bowl of food processor.
line.annotation: combine({ing40, ing41, ing42, ing43, ing44}, ing47, "ingredients", "")

line.originaltext: Combine all ingredients except parsley and Quaker® Rice Snacks in work bowl of food processor.
Combine all ingredients except parsley and Quaker® Rice Snacks in work bowl of food processor.
Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
Dip or spread each Quakes Ranch Flavor Rice Snack with hummus.
line.annotation: combine({ing46, ing50}, ing51, "rice cakes with hummus", "spread hummus on cakes")
